testRailSync.api.organizationUrl.title: API Organization URL
testRailSync.api.organizationUrl.description: Set the organization URL for TestRail API. This is the base URL for your TestRail instance, typically in the format 'https://yourcompany.testrail.com/index.php?â€œ'.

testRailSync.api.username.title: API Username
testRailSync.api.username.description: Set the username for TestRail API. This is the username you use to log in to TestRail.

testRailSync.api.key.title: API Key
testRailSync.api.key.description: Set the API key for TestRail API. This is a unique key that allows you to authenticate with the TestRail API.

testRailSync.api.projectId.title: API Project ID
testRailSync.api.projectId.description: Set the project ID for TestRail API. This is the ID of the project you want to sync with.

testRailSync.testCase.section_id.title: Test Case Section ID
testRailSync.testCase.section_id.description: Set this value if you want to use a default section ID for your test cases. This is the ID of the section where your test cases are located. A project can have multiple sections.

testRailSync.testCase.suite_id.title: Test Case Suite ID
testRailSync.testCase.suite_id.description: Set this value if you want to use a default suite ID for your test cases. This is the ID of the suite where your test cases are located. A section can have multiple suites.

testRailSync.testCase.template_id.title: Test Case Template ID
testRailSync.testCase.template_id.description: Set this value if you want to use a default template ID for your test cases. This is the ID of the template that defines the structure of your test cases.

testRailSync.testCase.type_id.title: Test Case Type ID
testRailSync.testCase.type_id.description: Set this value if you want to use a default type ID for your test cases. This is the ID of the type that defines the category of your test cases.

testRailSync.testCase.priority_id.title: Test Case Priority ID
testRailSync.testCase.priority_id.description: Set this value if you want to use a default priority ID for your test cases. This is the ID of the priority that defines the importance of your test cases.

testRailSync.testCase.custom_manual_vs_a.title: Test Case Custom Manual vs Automated
testRailSync.testCase.custom_manual_vs_a.description: Set this value if you want to use a default custom manual vs automated value for your test cases. This is the custom field that defines whether your test cases are manual or automated.

testRailSync.testCase.custom_manual_auto.title: Test Case Type Automation
testRailSync.testCase.custom_manual_auto.description: Set this value if you want to use a default type automation value for your test cases. This is the custom field that defines the type of automation performed on your test cases.

testRailSync.testCase.custom_automation_.title: Test Case Custom Automation Tool Type
testRailSync.testCase.custom_automation_.description: Set this value if you want to use a default custom automation tool type for your test cases. This is the custom field that defines the type of automation tool used for your test cases.

testRailSync.testCase.custom_test_level.title: Test Case Custom Test Level
testRailSync.testCase.custom_test_level.description: Set this value if you want to use a default custom test level for your test cases. This is the custom field that defines the level of testing performed on your test cases.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
